alert.note: Alert for Jackson (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 13 at 8:57AM MDT until May 14 at 3:49AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in South Dakota... White River near Kadoka affecting Jackson County. For the White River...including White River, Kadoka, and Oacoma... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...White River near Kadoka. * WHEN...Until late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, minimal low land flooding directly adjacent to the river occurs. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM MDT Saturday the stage was 14.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:45 AM MDT Saturday was 14.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 14.5 feet this afternoon. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening by 1000 PM MDT.
